name: Bomb Knight (Talluff)
description:
Use your head to navigate your way through a fantasy pixel world. Gain powerups and new movement options as you find new friends and progress.


Controls:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Spacebar
Interact - E

Upgrades:
Disable jump trigger - Hold Left Shift
Charge up big bomb - Hold Spacebar
Dash - Arrow Keys
ChainDash - Dash through a bomb head

Godmode (this is cheating but feel free to play around with it):
Activate/Deactive godmode - O


Art/Programming - Talluff
Audio - Ultimate SFX Bundle by Sidearm Studios
